detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ATRI (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ATRI.sol#119-218) has payable functions:
	 - ATRI.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ATRI.sol#132-134)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
